author: costin
msg: Added RequestAdapter and RequestAdapterImpl.java.
RequestAdapter is the interface that new adapters will implement.
It contain only the basic request informations and "hints" that
can be extracted from this info. No high-level Servlet objects
( like Session or Context ).
I need feedback on this interface !
RequestAdapterImpl will be the "default" setter-based implementation.

author: costin
msg: Added util.ArrayEnumerator ( based on VectorEnumerator ).
Will be used to clean up RequestImpl ( Array to vector conversions
to get an Enumerator)

author: costin
msg: Second step in request migration to adapter.
- reorder methods in RequestImpl based on functionality ( sorry - the
diff is hard to read, but IMHO RequestImpl is easier to read)
- added small comments in Request
- added a large comment in RequestImpl
- small clean-up in RequestImpl/MimeHeaders - removed Vector -> [] -> Vector
conversion, added a method that just return the original Vector
Please read the comments in RequestImpl before channging anything in
Request-related classes.
